content:
# I successfully harvested 10 stones from the stone resource patch, bringing my total to 20 stones in inventory, along with 10 iron ores.
# Now that I have sufficient stones, I can proceed to craft a stone furnace.

# First, I will ensure that I have the necessary materials to craft the stone furnace.
ensure_craftable(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Check and craft a stone furnace if materials are available.
